original_title: This Ain't The Barbershop: It's a XXX Parody
overview: This is actually the Barber Shop you dream about - where the ladies do a full "service." They cut your hair in the nude and give you a ride around the world. With beauties like Roxy and Toni Sweets you will be in trouble! Don't miss the amazing new comer Chanel and her crazy ass! This movie's so wild - with butts galore and tease to make you cry! There are so many funny moments, plus all the nasty hot sex to go with it! Original sound track! Shot on location!
title: This Ain't The Barbershop: It's a XXX Parody
